meanings.definition: A figure skating jump with a takeoff from the back inside edge of one skate and a full turn in the air before landing on the back outside edge of the opposite skate.
meanings.sent1: During the competition, she executed a perfect salchow, impressing the judges.
meanings.sent2: The skater practiced her salchow diligently to improve her routine.
meanings.sent3: The audience cheered as the skater attempted a salchow but ended up falling comically.
meanings.sent4: Her graceful salchow was like a swan gliding effortlessly across the ice.
meanings.sent5: The young skater's first successful salchow will always be a cherished memory.
